name: Arcana Domain
description: Clerics of the Arcana Domain serve deities of magic, gaining arcane secrets, warding against extraplanar threats, and blending cleric power with wizardly mastery.

1.name: Arcana Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Arcane Initiate
1.description: You gain proficiency in Arcana and learn two wizard cantrips of your choice.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Arcane Abjuration
2.description: You use divine magic to banish celestials, elementals, fey, or fiends.

6.name: Spell Breaker
6.description: When you restore hit points to an ally with a spell, you can also end certain spells affecting them.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

17.name: Arcane Mastery
17.description: You gain access to high-level arcane spells as domain spells, representing supreme command of magic.
